grid.title: Marcas contadas
grid.expression: SELECT CASE WHEN MARCA IS NULL THEN 'SEM MARCA' ELSE MARCA END AS MARCA, COUNT(CONTADOS.CODPROD) AS CONTADOS, COUNT(PRO.CODPROD) AS TOTAL, CASE WHEN CAST(COUNT(CONTADOS.CODPROD)*100.00/COUNT(PRO.CODPROD) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) < 10.00 THEN CAST(COUNT(CONTADOS.CODPROD)*100.00/COUNT(PRO.CODPROD) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) ELSE CAST(COUNT(CONTADOS.CODPROD)*100.00/COUNT(PRO.CODPROD) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) END AS PORCENTAGEM FROM sankhya.TGFPRO PRO WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN sankhya.AD_ESTHIST CONTADOS WITH (NOLOCK) ON (CONTADOS.CODPROD = PRO.CODPROD) AND CONTADOS.DATACONT = (SELECT MAX(DATACONT) FROM sankhya.ad_esthist HIST WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE HIST.CODPROD = PRO.CODPROD AND CAST(DATACONT AS DATE) BETWEEN :dtini AND :dtfim) WHERE PRO.ATIVO = 'S' AND PRO.CODVOL != 'KT' AND PRO.CODGRUPOPROD >= 100000 AND PRO.CODGRUPOPROD <= 199999 AND PRO.USOPROD <> 'S' GROUP BY MARCA ORDER BY CONTADOS DESC

grid.title: Visualizando itens da marca :MARCA
grid.expression: SELECT PRO.CODPROD AS CODIGO, (RTRIM(PRO.DESCRPROD) + CASE WHEN PRO.COMPLDESC IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' ' + RTRIM(COMPLDESC) END) AS NOMEPRODUTO, CASE WHEN EST.DATACONT IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(CAST(EST.DATACONT AS DATE) AS VARCHAR) ELSE 'NÃ£o Contado' END AS DATACONTAGEM FROM sankhya.AD_ESTHIST EST WITH (nolock) RIGHT JOIN sankhya.TGFPRO PRO ON (PRO.CODPROD = EST.CODPROD) AND EST.DATACONT = (SELECT MAX(DATACONT) FROM sankhya.ad_esthist HIST WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE HIST.CODPROD = PRO.CODPROD AND CAST(DATACONT AS DATE) BETWEEN :dtini AND :dtfim) WHERE ((PRO.MARCA = :MARCA AND :MARCA <> 'SEM MARCA') OR (PRO.MARCA IS NULL AND :MARCA = 'SEM MARCA')) AND PRO.ATIVO = 'S' AND PRO.CODVOL != 'KT' AND PRO.CODGRUPOPROD >= 100000 AND PRO.CODGRUPOPROD <= 199999 AND PRO.USOPROD <> 'S' ORDER BY CAST(EST.DATACONT AS DATE)
